full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Tender Details

**Tender Title (English)**: W2604-23JP04 Non-destructive Testing (NDT)
**Tender Title (French)**: W2604-23JP04 Essai Non-Destructif (END)
**Reference Number**: WS4100156942-Doc4211565396
**Solicitation Number**: WS4100156942

#### Tender Information

**Publication Date**: September 18, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: October 12, 2023 (originally scheduled for 2:00 PM EDT)
**Amendment Date**: October 13, 2023 ( adjusts closing time)
**Expected Contract Start Date**: September 06, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date**: September 05, 2026
**Tender Status**: Cancelled

#### Procurement Information

**References**: UNSPC 78181800
**Description (English)**: Fixed wing aircraft maintenance and repair services
**Description (French)**: Services de maintenance et de réparation d'aéronefs à voilure fixe

**Procurement Type**: Request for Standing Offer
**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
**Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
**Trade Agreements**: None

#### Contracting Entity and End User

**Contracting Entity (English)**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
**Contracting Entity (French)**: Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5

**End User (English)**: Department of National Defence (DND)
**End User (French)**: Ministère de la Défense nationale (MDN)
Address: 101, promenade Colonel By, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2

#### Contact Information

**Contact Person**: Wiebe, Lyland (SPAC/PSPC)
**Contact Email**: lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
**Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17478765?extsite=MTc0Nzg3NjVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
